Home.name: DappWeb
Home.title: Metakina RWA
Home.description: A multilingual Next.js 15 starter with built-in i18n support. Launch your global-ready web application with a clean, efficient, and SEO-friendly foundation.

Consult.title: Unlock Trillion-Dollar Assets, Connect Global Capital Compliantly
Consult.subtitle: Providing institutional-grade, end-to-end, compliance-first RWA and data asset tokenization solutions to empower your asset potential.

challenges.title: Challenges Facing Traditional and Data Assets

liquidity.title: Liquidity Dilemma
liquidity.description: Non-standard assets are difficult to liquidate quickly, with high holding costs.

financing.title: Financing & Compliance Challenges
financing.description: Traditional channels have high barriers, cross-border and data asset compliance is complex.

efficiency.title: Lack of Efficiency & Transparency
efficiency.description: Lengthy transaction processes, information asymmetry, and high management costs.

solutions.mainTitle: End-to-End RWA and Data Asset Tokenization Services

assetDigital.title: Asset Digitalization
assetDigital.description: Leverage AI for asset standardization, design standard Tokenomics, and implement secure smart contracts for asset tokenization.

crossBorder.title: Compliant Cross-Border Financing
crossBorder.description: Design financing structures compliant with cross-border regulations (e.g., Hong Kong JP+ or CFLP), connecting global compliant investor networks.

compliance.title: Full-Process Compliance
compliance.description: Built on compliance principles, providing regulatory interpretation, integrated KYC/AML/KYB, ensuring data security and privacy.

ecosystem.title: Ecosystem & Market Operations
ecosystem.description: Utilize Metaverse AI for market analysis, build and operate communities, coordinate market connections, provide ongoing technical maintenance and branding.

dataFinance.title: Data Asset Financialization
dataFinance.description: Based on China's 'Data Asset Recognition' policy, providing full-service from compliance governance to financial solution design and market connections.

modular.title: Modular & Customization
modular.description: Flexibly select service modules based on project needs and budget, we provide highly customized solutions.

coo.description: Senior financial background, asset management and risk control expert

ceo.description: Operations management expert, specializing in process optimization and compliance execution

cto.description: Technology expert, proficient in blockchain and smart contract security

cmo.description: Marketing expert, brand and market communication

RWACooperation.title: MetaTalk RWA Digital Investment Banking Partnership Program

registered.title: Registered Partner
registered.description: Establish connections, access cooperation information and basic resources.

certified.title: Certified Partner
certified.description: Obtain professional certification, enjoy exclusive support, market resources and commission incentives.

premium.title: Premium Partner
premium.description: Deep strategic cooperation, sharing market resources, highest benefits, MDF and exclusive courses/software licenses.

modular.title: Modular Services
modular.description: Combine core service modules as needed.

customized.title: Customized Solutions
customized.description: Tailor-made for special assets or large-scale projects.

transparent.title: Transparent Pricing
transparent.description: Detailed cost breakdown, optional milestone or performance-based models.
